data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Peter K. L., Forges, Bertrand Richer De (2007): A new species of deep-water spider crab of the genus Rochinia A. Milne-Edwards, 1875, from Guam (Crustacea: Brachyura: Majidae). Zootaxa 1610: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.178904
